Package meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class BPNN

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.ProblemTransformationMethod
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.NN.AbstractNeuralNet
            • meka.classifiers.multilabel.BPNN
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, MultiXClassifier, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.OptionHandler

    public class BPNN
extends AbstractNeuralNet
    BPNN.java - Back Propagation Neural Network. This is a standard back-propagated Neural Network with multiple outputs that correspond to multiple labels.
    If trained 'from scratch' only 1 layer is possible, but if you initialise it (from another method) with pre-trained weight matrices, the number of layers is inferred from that.
    Version:
    March 2013
    Author:
    Jesse Read
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • presetWeights

        public void presetWeights​(Jama.Matrix[] W,
                          int L)
                   throws Exception
        Preset Weights - Initialize a BPNN with (pre-trained) weight matrices W (which also determines X dimensions).
        Parameters:
        W - pre-trained weight matrix (should include bias weights, assume W[-1]-1 hidden units in penultimate layer not including bias])
        L - the number of labels (for making the final matrix)
        Throws:
        Exception

      • initWeights

        public void initWeights​(int d,
                        int L,
                        int[] H)
                 throws Exception
        InitWeights - Initialize a BPNN of H.length hidden layers with H[0], H[1], etc hidden units in each layer (W will be random, and of the corresponding dimensions).
        Parameters:
        d - number of visible units
        L - number of labels (output units)
        H - number of units in hidden layers, H.length = number of hidden layers. CURRENTLY LIMITED TO 1.
        Throws:
        Exception

        public Jama.Matrix[] forwardPass​(double[][] X_)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
